entry.title: Lavender Stems - Set of 4
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Flower Stems
Price: 28.00

Come in pack of 4pcs. Assorted colors.

This adorable and lovely mini flowers stems will create heartwarming spring atmosphere in your home. Designed in pastel colours with unique needle felted pattern. All our pastel flower collections will fill your home with Easter spirit and will revive fresh hope. It is made of 100% wool by using only soap and water.

composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material.
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover.
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.

For decoration only and not intended to be used as a toy.



Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.

entry.title: Mixed Berries - Set of 2
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Flower Stems
Price: 10.00

This charming handmade flower is a great alternative to real flowers that will last forever! It requires minimum care. They make such a simple and lovely gift for any occasion or just simply add anywhere in your room. The flower is attached to a flexible wire stem and then wire is felted again with green wool. You can gently straighten out the flower until you are happy with the arrangement. Do not to rub the felt too much. By keeping them out of direct sunlight will prevent the colours from fading.

composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material. 
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover. 
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.


Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.
